sentences.english: Dried persimmon is one of the characteristic local products in Licheng.
sentences.chinese: 柿餅是黎城縣特色土產之一。

sentences.english: The inhibiting technologies against browning in dried persimmon were researched in part three.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要研究了柿餅加工中抑制褐變的關鍵技術。

sentences.english: My dear little brother had eyes only for persimmon pies and he was too anxious to wait for the porridge.
sentences.chinese: 我親愛的小弟弟對柿餅情有獨鍾，已經等不及煮粥了。

sentences.english: Without a doubt, the Persimmon Festival is a feast for all of the senses.
sentences.chinese: 柿餅節毫無疑問是所有感官的饗宴。

sentences.english: This text introduced that the methods of removing puckery for persimmon and the processing techniques of dried persimmon.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了柿子脫澀方法和柿餅加工的有關技術。

definition: Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
ta-a noodles or danzai noodles, popular snack originating from Tainan
to break out of an eggshell/to molt/to remove the husk/to shell
winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
food preserved in sugar or honey
cabbage/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]/Taiwan pr. [gao1 li4 cai4]
Cantonese sponge cake also known as mara cake
